Looking for an Audi A3 near Washington?

The Audi A3 features cool design inside and out, confident dynamics and high-quality build and materials. With the largest selection of cars from dealers and private sellers, Autotrader can help find the perfect A3 for you.

Autotrader has 49 Audi A3s for sale near Washington, DC, including a Used 2006 Audi A3 1.8T Premium, a Used 2006 Audi A3 2.0T, and a Used 2006 Audi A3 S-Line.

Not sure if an A3 is the right fit for you?
